divs: sighting detailsi'm eastern time so it was just about the end of dusk, i was outside smoking a cigarette looking up at the stars\moon as i usually do whilst smoking.i saw this object flying really low in the sky (750-1250 feet) and making no noise whatsoever. no jet engines and i think i would have even been able to hear a propeller if it was a small aircraft. anyway, it looked sort of triangular in shape with three lights on it, two where white and one was green. hard to judge its size but i would estimate it was about 60x80 yards. i saw it fly behind two symmetrical buildings, so my view was obscured for a few seconds, then it passed by the two buildings. i looked away for a few seconds, then saw it fly by the buildings in the same area and direction i had seen it fly not 2 seconds ago. i don't know of any human made craft that could change direction like that. i got this sense like "that's not human" when i saw it, this gut reaction. i know it won't mean much here but my intuition is usually quite sharp. after i had this feeling like i saw something unusual and somewhat exciting.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mansfield
There were no other sightings in Mansfield on or around April 5th 2011
